Name: trftype
column6: oid of the data type this transform is for

Name: trflang
column6: oid of the language this transform is for

Name: trffromsql
column6: the oid of the function to use when converting the data type for input to the procedural language (e.g., function parameters). zero is stored if this operation is not supported.

Name: trftosql
column6: the oid of the function to use when converting output from the procedural language (e.g., return values) to the data type. zero is stored if this operation is not supported.
